|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Senao PAC3300 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A, NGB639.001C, 1328, KOREA; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ESR1750-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the mainboard in the FCC photos. :"PAC3300-0.20 LFP 94V-0 1343" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
The FCC ID on the label on at least some of these devices appears to be A8JESR900 <??>. :The newer A8JESR1750 FCC ID was issued before the end of 2013. The filings for this FCC ID do indeed mention the ESR1750 and ESR1200 within the test report... :but only 802.11n (and lower) rates seem to be tested (there is no mention of 80MHz / VHT modes) :and the photos cover the ESR900 only (w/ its 3x3 11an AR9580 radio).
Additional specifications, per ''EnGenius'''s product page, follow... *Weight: 0.5 lbs *Diameter: 6.36" *Height: 1.64"
Default settings (including the SSID formats and the presumed used 88:DC:96 OUI) are per the FCC sample label.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32232-engenius-dual-band-wireless-ac1750-cloud-gigabit-router-with-usb-port-and-enshare-reviewed ''EnGenius Dual Band Wireless AC1750 Cloud Gigabit Router with USB Port and EnShare Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 @720MHz 3T3R 802.11n WiSoC :*RAM: 128 MB ??, Flash: 16 MB :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 :- 2.4 GHz Power Amp [http://ww1.microchip.com/downloads/en/DeviceDoc/S71291.pdf ''SST'' 12LP15A] (x3) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 :- 5 GHz Power Amp marked 15E37TV (x3) :*Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337
===Additional external links=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32178-engenius-launches-80211ac-line ''EnGenius Launches 802.11ac Line'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/engenius/esr1750 ''EnGenius ESR1750'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] (bootlog)
